  • public class ECPedersenCoinflip
extends TrapdoorBlumTwoPartyGroupElementFlip<java.math.BigInteger,org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint,java.math.BigInteger>
    Elliptic-curve implementation of the TrapdoorBlumTwoPartyGroupElementFlip using a PedersenCommitment as the trapdoor commitment scheme.
